tool_description: Organizes focus group sessions for qualitative data collection, including participant recruitment and discussion guides.

research_topics.description: Key topics to explore in focus group discussions

participant_criteria.description: Specific criteria for selecting focus group participants

number_of_sessions.description: Desired number of focus group sessions

session_duration.description: Planned duration for each session in minutes (60-180)

group_size.description: Target number of participants per group (6-12)

virtual_option.description: Whether to include virtual participation options

error_messages: Empty research topics: Provide at least one topic to explore in focus groups.
Invalid session parameters: Session duration must be 60-180 minutes, group size must be 6-12 participants.
Too many topics: Limit research topics to 8 or fewer for manageable discussion.
Insufficient participant criteria: Provide specific criteria for participant selection.
usage: Define research topics and participant criteria, then specify session preferences. Tool creates focus group plans with discussion guides and logistical arrangements.

discussion_guide.description: Structured questions and prompts for focus group facilitation

session_logistics.description: Practical arrangements needed for each session

data_collection_protocol.description: Guidelines for recording and analyzing focus group data
